meanings.definition: The act of botching or making a mess of something.
meanings.sent1: His botchery of the painting left it unrecognizable.
meanings.sent2: The botchery of the repair work was evident in the leaky faucet.
meanings.sent3: The chef's botchery of the recipe turned the dish into a disaster.
meanings.sent4: Her botchery of the presentation was like a puzzle missing key pieces.
meanings.sent5: The botchery of the construction made the building unsafe to inhabit.

meanings.definition: A botched or poorly executed job or task.
meanings.sent1: The customer was dissatisfied with the botchery of the haircut.
meanings.sent2: The botchery of the project led to delays and extra costs.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's botchery of the joke made the audience groan.
meanings.sent4: The botchery of the plan was a recipe for disaster.
meanings.sent5: His botchery of the dance routine made everyone laugh.
